meanings.definition: Elite - a select group that is superior in terms of ability or qualities
meanings.sent1: The leet of students in the advanced class always excels in their studies.
meanings.sent2: The country's leet athletes will be competing in the upcoming championship.
meanings.sent3: Being part of the leet team means you have to work hard to maintain your position.
meanings.sent4: She stood out from the crowd, a leet among the ordinary.
meanings.sent5: The leet soldiers were known for their bravery and skill in battle.

meanings.definition: Leet - a system of modified spellings used primarily on the internet to represent letters by numbers or special characters
meanings.sent1: Some gamers use leet speak to communicate online more quickly.
meanings.sent2: The hacker used leet to disguise their messages from being easily understood.
meanings.sent3: The leet language can be confusing for those not familiar with online jargon.
meanings.sent4: In leet, 'h4x0r' means 'hacker' in regular language.
meanings.sent5: Learning leet can be fun for those interested in internet culture.

meanings.sent1: The dog leeted on the fire hydrant during their walk.
meanings.sent2: Please don't leet on the grass, use the restroom instead.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally leeted in his pants when he couldn't find a bathroom in time.
meanings.sent4: The toddler proudly announced that he had leeted successfully in the potty.
meanings.sent5: The comedian joked about his fear of leeting in public restrooms.
